= Introduction =

This page is intended to describe how to build the [http://wilma.vub.ac.be/~se2_0910/ Salemen project's website].

== Using SSH ==

  # Connect to `wilma.vub.ac.be` using SSH with `se2_0910` as the username.
  # `$ cd ws/repo/salesmen/trunk/www/wilma.vub.ac.be.se2_0910`
  # `ant publish`
